item.title: First business models
item.description: Last week, we created the first version of the business model canvas for InsectSense. We retrieved the information from the website of InsectSense. Since the company is in a starting up phase, there is limited information available. The first version of the business model canvas (in Dutch): We realized that we missed a lot of information and decided to send an e-mail to Aria (founder of InsectSense). The following questions were asked:
